parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Return the value of variable in the variable space of given FSM. The FSM handle is the number returned by the [[execFSM]] command.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> FSMhandle '''getFSMVariable''' name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> FSMhandle: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - name of the variable

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Anything]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> FSMhandle '''getFSMVariable''' [name, defaultValue] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.67</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [name, defaultValue]: [[Array]] -

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> FSMhandle: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> name: [[String]] - name of the variable

</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> defaultValue: [[Anything]] - value to return if variable is [[nil]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Anything]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_handle [[getFSMVariable]] "_foo";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value><code>_handle [[getFSMVariable]] ["_foo", 123];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[FSM]], [[commandFSM]], [[completedFSM]], [[doFSM]] [[execFSM]], [[setFSMVariable]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
